main event: A male civilian witnessed a bright blue-green glow in the sky over Abilene, Texas, on January 1, 1948.
interesting points: The glow was fan-shaped and lasted for about 2 seconds,The object was observed stationary in a clear sky,No discernable sound was reported during the sighting,There was speculation that the glow might be related to electrical disturbances or experiments at White Sands Proving Grounds,This incident has no astronomical explanation according to the reports.
sighted object: a fan-shaped glow of bright blue-green color
witness description: male civilian who reported the sighting
